inclusion.criterion: elective caesarean section under spinal anaesthesia
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: surgery and anaesthesia expected to be uncomplicated
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: scheduled for tubal ligation surgery as part of caesarean section
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: diseases of pregnancy: e.g. pregnancy induced hypertension
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: grand multiparity - ie parity of 5 or greater
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: pre-operative pyrexia (temperature of 37.5 degrees C or greater)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: significant co-existing maternal disease - e.g. congenital heart disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: co-existing maternal disease that could impact on temperature- e.g. hypo/hyperthyroid
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 16-year-old girl recently diagnosed with myasthenia gravis, class IIa. She complains of diplopia and weakness affecting her upper extremities.
